text: Bluebeard is a 1972 Italian German French horror movie directed by Edward Dmytryk and based on the 1697 folk tale of the same name by Charles Perrault. It stars Richard Burton, Raquel Welch, Joey Heatherton, Sybil Danning, Jean Lefebvre and was distributed by Cinerama Releasing Corporation. ==Other websites== * * Category:1972 movies Category:1970s serial killer movies Category:1972 horror movies Category:French horror movies Category:German horror movies Category:Italian horror movies Category:Movies directed by Edward Dmytryk
title: Bluebeard (1972 movie)
